text: Aria is an airline based in Mulhouse, France. It operates ad hoc passenger and cargo flights, as well as medevac flights. Its main base is Paris - Le Bourget Airport == History == The airline was established in March 2004 and started operations in September 2004. It operated a scheduled service between Basle/Mulhouse and Toulouse, "La compagnie aérienne Aria relance la ligne Toulouse-Mulhouse", La Dépêche du Midi, December 10, 2004 (in French). but this was suspended on 25 January 2005."Aria suspend sa ligne Mulhouse- Toulouse", L'Echo touristique, February 14, 2005 (in French)."Aria stoppe la ligne Toulouse-Mulhouse", La Dépêche du Midi, February 18, 2005 (in French). The airline hoped to resume and build a regional network, but this has not happened. == Fleet == The Aria fleet consists of the following aircraft (at March 2007): *1 Raytheon Beech 1900C Airliner *1 Raytheon Beech King Air C90B ==References== ==External links== *ARIA official website * Category:Defunct airlines of France Category:Airlines established in 2004 Category:Airlines disestablished in 2005
title: Aria (French airline)
